com.eco.bio7.discrete

Class Field

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.eco.bio7.discrete.Field

  • public class Field
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides some static methods for the creation and variation of discrete grid models. The quadgrid and the hexgrid are affected by this methods.
    Author:
    Bio7

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Field()

      A random function for the discrete grid.

    • Method Detail

      • chance

        public static void chance()
        A random function for the discrete grid. Plants and states are dispersed over the grid.

      • resetField

        public static void resetField()
        A method which will set the field values to 0 (xyold,xynew) and to null (plantold,plantnew)

      • setSize

        public static void setSize(int x,
                           int y)
        A method for adjusting the size of the discrete field.
        Parameters:
        x - the width of the field.
        y - the height of the field.

      • torus

        public static int[] torus(int x,
                          int y,
                          int dx,
                          int dy)
        A method which returns the coordinates of the neighbourhood of the given distance.
        Parameters:
        x - the x-coordinate.
        y - the y-coordinate
        dx - the distance from the x-coordinate.
        dy - the distance from the y-coordinate.
        Returns:
        an integer array with the coordinates of the given distance.

      • torusMooreSum

        public static int torusMooreSum(int n,
                                int x,
                                int y)
        A method which calculates the sum of the cells in the neighbourhood n*8.
        Parameters:
        n - an integer value for the neighbourhood.
        x - the x-coordinate of the center cell.
        y - the y-coordinate of the center cell.
        Returns:
        the sum of the neighbourhood.

      • copyOldNew

        public static void copyOldNew()
        Copies the values of the temporary plant and temporary state array to the plant and state array.

      • doPaint

        public static void doPaint()
        Repaints the discrete quad and if available the discrete hexagon panel.

        Returns:
        the rectangle array of the discrete quad field.

        Method for the access of the Polygon (Hexagon) array.
        Returns:
        the polygon array of the discrete hexagon field.

        Returns the size of the quads.

                              int y,
                              java.lang.String name)
        A method which returns a boolean true value if the given state with name exists at the given coordinates.
        Parameters:

        y - the y-coordinate of the grid.
        name - the name of the state.
        Returns:
        a boolean value.
